name: Chichan Apartment - Unit 1217
address: Park 5 - 1217 Times City Park Hills, Minh Khai Street, Hai Ba Trun District, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering a garden, Chichan Apartment - Unit 1217 is set in Hanoi. Hanoi Creative City is 1.4 km away. Free WiFi is provided .

Chichan Apartment - Unit 1217 also includes an outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, with grocery delivery available on request.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the property and the area is popular for cycling. Hanoi Opera House is 2.6 km from Chichan Apartment - Unit 1217. Noi Bai International Airport is 24 km from the property.
